      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Manager.abort(Transaction t)
      perform abort operation, abort a transaction
      boolean Variable.canWait(Transaction t)
      check if a transaction can wait for efficiency, there is no need to add a lock to the wait list if there exists an older transaction, so the time stamps of the transactions in the wait list should be in strict decreasing order
      static void Manager.end(Transaction t, boolean isCommited)
      perform end operation, end a transaction
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Transaction 
      Constructor and Description
      Lock(Transaction transaction, Variable variable, Site site, java.lang.String type, int value, boolean isActive)
      Constructor when a lock is created, its pointer will be stored in three objects: the variable, the site and the transaction.
